CSCI P-14110 Introduction to Programming, Computational Science, and Data Visualization

This is the course website CSCI P-14110

  • View On GitHub

Lesson 9 - Sci Viz vs. Info viz, Movies - 2D & 3D, Publish your viz (optional)

Resources

Online 3D viewers

  • creators3d.com

Kepler Planets info

  • Exoplanet Archive - see “Data –> Confirmed Planets” option (hover over “Data”)
  • Exoplanet orbit database (deprecated, but with plots)
  • astroquery API

Planet viz

  • Super Planet Crash Game

Python Library downloads

  • Hermite Sims Library (hermite_library.py)
  • Conversions Library (convert_kepler_data.py)
  • Animations Library (animations_library.py)
  • Little color flipping Library (flip_colors.py)

Data Downloads

  • We’ll be using this NASA planet database CSV file (planets_2020.06.22_10.10.17.csv) today.
  • And this set of simulated orbits (data.zip, 81M) today.

Reading

  1. FDV, Ch. 13: Visualizing time series
  2. Optional: yt project; ipyvolume docs
  3. Optional: info about GitHub pages (video on page)
